alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 27 at 3:37PM EST until February 27 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 47 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHERN KENTUCKY CAMPBELL IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 27 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO DELAWARE FAIRFIELD FAYETTE OH FRANKLIN OH HOCKING LICKING MADISON PICKAWAY UNION OH IN SOUTH CENTRAL OHIO ADAMS HIGHLAND PIKE ROSS SCIOTO IN SOUTHWEST OHIO BROWN CLERMONT CLINTON WARREN IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AUGLAIZE CHAMPAIGN CLARK GREENE HARDIN LOGAN MIAMI MONTGOMERY SHELBY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, ALEXANDRIA, BEAVERCREEK, BELLEFONTAINE, BLANCHESTER, CHILLICOTHE, CIRCLEVILLE, COLUMBUS, DAYTON, DELAWARE, FAIRBORN, GEORGETOWN, GREENFIELD, HILLSBORO, KENTON, KETTERING, LANCASTER, LEBANON, LOGAN, LONDON, MARYSVILLE, MASON, MILFORD, MOUNT ORAB, NEWARK, NEWPORT, PEEBLES, PICKERINGTON, PIKE LAKE, PIKETON, PIQUA, PLAIN CITY, PORTSMOUTH, SIDNEY, SPRINGBORO, SPRINGFIELD, ST. MARYS, TIPP CITY, TROY, URBANA, WAPAKONETA, WASHINGTON COURT HOUSE, WAVERLY, WEST JEFFERSON, WEST UNION, WHEELERSBURG, WILMINGTON, AND XENIA.
